ðŸ“– Summary: The OpenMower project aims to replace the limited software of cheap robotic lawn mowers with a modern, smart, RTK GPS-based system. It leverages existing hardware from off-the-shelf mowers, focusing on software improvements for autonomous mowing, safety, and advanced features like no perimeter wire and obstacle avoidance.
